name: Mobovivo
description: Mobovivo is a team of TV producers and talented software engineers that turn the TV industries biggest threat - mobile devices pulling audiences away from TV - into their greatest asset - advertising revenue. Mobovivo Second Screen and Social TV platform supports over 100 million interactions / minute for companies like ESPN, TWC and Intel enabling TV viewers to engage with shows across multiple screens.
